description: Bolse Bluetooth 4.0 USB adapterA new version of the Bluetooth wireless device-to-device technology that offers significantly lower power consumption than previous versions. Also referred to as Bluetooth Low Energy, Bluetooth 4.0 achieves its reduced power consumption by enabling devices to remain paired, or connected to each other, without requiring a continual stream of data to be transferred between the devices.SpecificationsCompatible with 32 bit and 64 bit Windows 8 / Windows 7 / Vista / XP (*Not Compatible with Mac OS*)Bluetooth 4.0 is designed to be more intelligent about managing those connections, especially when it comes to conserving energyLatest Version 4.0 Class 2 Smart Ready Adapter with Low Energy Technology, backwards compatible with earlier Bluetooth versionsExtremely compact size, enables your PC or laptop to wirelessly communicate with Bluetooth-enabled devices, Smartphones, tablets, keyboards, mice, speakers, printers, headsets and moreWireless range of up to 30 feet (10 meters), perfect for file sharing, music streaming and moreTransforms any computer with a USB port to a Bluetooth enabled computerPackage Includes1 Bolse Bluetooth USB Adapter, 1 Installation CD, 1 User guide**Note**- Windows 8 users can plug and play without the installation CD- Windows 7/ Vista / XP users need to use installation CDBolseAt Bolse, we're fascinated by gadgets and have been customers ourselves long enough to know the difference between what's merely good and what's really great. No matter how quickly technology changes, Bolse can help you stay ahead of the pack.2 Year Manufacturer Warranty from Bolse
title: Bolse® Bluetooth 4.0 (Latest Version) USB Adapter - Compatible with Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Vista / Xp
